lead_paragraph: The National Liberation Army, Colombia’s second-largest rebel group, follows in the footsteps of the largest one in moving closer to ending a 52-year conflict.
snippet: The National Liberation Army, Colombia’s second-largest rebel group, follows in the footsteps of the largest one in moving closer to ending a 52-year conflict....

headline.main: 2nd Colombian Rebel Group Steps Up to the Table for Peace Talks
headline.print_headline: 2nd Colombian Rebel Group Comes to Table for Peace Talks
